title: 50/50 (2011) 720p iTunes
description:
50/50 (2011) 100 min

DESCRIPTION:
Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes overbearing support of his crude best friend, his smothering mother and an inexperienced therapist. Inspired by the life of screenwriter Will Reiser. (with audio commentary by director Jonathan Levine, actor Seth Rogen, producers Ben Karlin and Evan Goldberg, and writer Will Reiser.)

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1280x544 23.98 fps h.264 @ ~1901 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3 / 96 Kbps 2.0 AAC (commentary)
S: English & English SDH

SOURCE:
Retail Blu-ray Disc

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices (iPad, iPhone 4, etc) that can handle HD video, including *all* versions of the AppleTV set top box.
